title: ğŸ“Œ è Ÿç‡­å½¢æ…‹åµæ¸¬ +å‚™è¨»èªªæ˜æ–¹å‘
pine:
//==================================================================
//@version=5
indicator("ğŸ“Œ è Ÿç‡­å½¢æ…‹åµæ¸¬ + å³ä¸Šå‚™è¨»", overlay=true, max_labels_count=500)

//------------------------------------------------------------------
// â‘  å½¢æ…‹åµæ¸¬å€ï¼ˆèˆ‡å…ˆå‰ç¯„ä¾‹ç›¸åŒï¼Œå¯è‡ªè¡Œæ“´å……ï¼‰
//------------------------------------------------------------------

// --- åå™¬å½¢æ…‹ ---
bullishEngulfing = close[1] < open[1] and close > open and close > open[1] and open < close[1]
bearishEngulfing = close[1] > open[1] and close < open and close < open[1] and open > close[1]

// --- æ—©æ™¨ / é»ƒæ˜ä¹‹æ˜Ÿ ---
morningStar = close[2] < open[2] and close[1] < open[1] and close > open and close > (open[2] + close[2]) / 2
eveningStar = close[2] > open[2] and close[1] > open[1] and close < open and close < (open[2] + close[2]) / 2

// --- ä¸‰ç·šå…µ / ä¸‰çƒé´‰ ---
threeWhiteSoldiers = close > open and close[1] > open[1] and close[2] > open[2]
threeBlackCrows    = close < open and close[1] < open[1] and close[2] < open[2]

// --- å…¶ä»–å–®æ ¹å½¢æ…‹ ---
doji         = math.abs(close - open) <= (high - low) * 0.1
tLine        = open == close and low == open and high > close          // T å­—ç·š
gravestone   = open == close and high == open and low < close          // å¢“ç¢‘ç·š
shootingStar = high - math.max(open, close) > (high - low) * 0.6 and  // æµæ˜Ÿ
               math.abs(close - open) < (high - low) * 0.3 and
               low == math.min(open, close)
hammer       = open - low  > (high - low) * 0.5 and                    // éŒ˜å­ç·š
               close > open and
               high - close < (high - low) * 0.3

//------------------------------------------------------------------
// â‘¡ ç•«å‡ºåµæ¸¬çµæœï¼ˆæ¨™ç±¤å¯æ›æˆ shape æˆ–æ–‡å­—ï¼Œéš¨æ„ï¼‰
//------------------------------------------------------------------
plotLabel(cond, y, txt, clr) =>
    if cond
        label.new(bar_index, y, txt,
           style = txt == "åšå¤š" ? label.style_label_up   : label.style_label_down,
           color = clr, textcolor=color.white, size=size.small)

plotLabel(bullishEngulfing, high,  "å¤šé ­åå™¬", color.lime)
plotLabel(bearishEngulfing, low ,  "ç©ºé ­åå™¬", color.red)
plotLabel(morningStar     , high,  "æ—©æ™¨ä¹‹æ˜Ÿ", color.teal)
plotLabel(eveningStar     , low ,  "é»ƒæ˜ä¹‹æ˜Ÿ", color.orange)
plotLabel(threeWhiteSoldiers, high, "ä¸‰ç·šå…µ",  color.lime)
plotLabel(threeBlackCrows  , low , "ä¸‰çƒé´‰",  color.red)
plotLabel(tLine           , low ,  "Tå­—ç·š",   color.lime)
plotLabel(gravestone      , high,  "å¢“ç¢‘ç·š",  color.red)
plotLabel(doji            , close, "åå­—æ˜Ÿ",  color.gray)
plotLabel(shootingStar    , high,  "æµæ˜Ÿ",    color.red)
plotLabel(hammer          , low ,  "éŒ˜å­ç·š",  color.lime)

//------------------------------------------------------------------
// â‘¢ å³ä¸Šè§’å‚™è¨»ï¼ˆä½ çš„å›ºå®šæ¨™ç±¤ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ + æ“ä½œæ–¹å‘èªªæ˜ï¼‰
//------------------------------------------------------------------
infoText =
     "ğŸ“Š å½¢æ…‹æ–¹å‘æŒ‡å—\n" +
     "ğŸ”º å¤šé ­å½¢æ…‹ï¼ˆåšå¤šï¼‰\n"  +
     "ã€€â€¢ å¤šé ­åå™¬\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ æ—©æ™¨ä¹‹æ˜Ÿ\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ ä¸‰ç·šå…µ\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ éŒ˜å­ç·š / Tå­—ç·š\n" +
     "\n" +
     "ğŸ”» ç©ºé ­å½¢æ…‹ï¼ˆåšç©ºï¼‰\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ ç©ºé ­åå™¬\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ é»ƒæ˜ä¹‹æ˜Ÿ\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ ä¸‰çƒé´‰\n" +
     "ã€€â€¢ æµæ˜Ÿ / å¢“ç¢‘ç·š\n" +
     "\n" +
     "ğŸ‘€ åå­—æ˜Ÿï¼šè§€æœ›ï¼Œç­‰å¾…æ–¹å‘ç¢ºèª\n" +
     "\n" +
     "ğŸŸª RVSï¼šåŒ…ä½ EMA10/20ï¼Œå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 2%\n" +
     "â­ RVS-â˜…ï¼šå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 4.5%ï¼Œè¶…å¼·åè½‰"

rightShift = 11                         // â† è¦–è¢å¹•å¯¬åº¦å¯èª¿
topY       = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04 // â† å°‡æ¨™ç±¤ç¨å¾®æ‹‰é«˜

var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(x=bar_index + rightShift,
                           y=topY,
                           text=infoText,
                           xloc=xloc.bar_index,
                           yloc=yloc.price,
                           style=label.style_label_left,
                           size=size.small,
                           color=color.new(#000000, 100),
                           textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY)
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

title: RDç¾è²¨-ç„¡ç­–ç•¥+é¬§é˜ç‰ˆæœ¬+å°é½ŠåŠ ç¢¼ç­–ç•¥ç‰ˆæœ¬
summary:
è«‹å‹¿å¤–æµ!!! è«‹å‹¿å¤–æµ!!! è«‹å‹¿å¤–æµ!!!
å°å—æˆé•·å‹_å°ç†è²¡åœˆ ç¬¬ä¸€æ‰‹è…³æœ¬
é€™æ˜¯ä¸€å¥— ç„¡ç­–ç•¥ã€ç´”æŒ‡æ¨™å‹è…³æœ¬ï¼Œå°ˆç‚º è¦–è¦ºè¾¨è­˜ + å¿«è¨Šæé†’ + åŠ ç¢¼æç¤º è¨­è¨ˆã€‚
å®Œç¾å°æ‡‰å¯¦æˆ°æ“ä½œæµç¨‹ï¼Œæ”¯æ´ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§æ‡¶äººå¿«è¨Šè¨­å®šï¼Œä¸éœ€æ‰‹å‹•èª¿æ•´ç­–ç•¥åƒæ•¸ã€‚

âœ… å…§å«åµæ¸¬æ¨¡çµ„ï¼š
EMA10 / EMA20 é›™å‡ç·š

MACD é‡‘å‰ / æ­»å‰ï¼ˆ6-26-9ï¼‰

RVS / RVS-â˜… åŒ…ä½åˆ¤æ–·ï¼ˆå« 2%ã€4.5% å¯¦é«”ï¼‰

æ’ä½ğŸ›¡ï¸åˆ¤æ–·ï¼ˆRVS å¾Œæ‹‰å›ç«™ç©©ï¼‰
å¤–éƒ¨å¤šç©ºå½¢æ…‹ï¼ˆæ•´æ ¹é«˜æ–¼ / ä½æ–¼é›™ EMAï¼‰
ğŸ“ˆ å¤šå–®åŠ ç¢¼ï¼ğŸ“‰ ç©ºå–®åŠ ç¢¼ï¼ˆèˆ‡ç­–ç•¥ç‰ˆæœ¬åŒæ­¥ä½ç½®ï¼‰
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("ğŸ“Œ RDç¾è²¨-ç„¡ç­–ç•¥+é¬§é˜ç‰ˆï¼ˆå«å¤šç©ºåŠ ç¢¼ï¼‰", overlay=true)

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue, linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Length"  , minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Length"  , minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Length", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

plotshape(goldenCross, title="MACD é‡‘å‰", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime, size=size.small,
          text="GC", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross , title="MACD æ­»å‰", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, color=color.red , size=size.small,
          text="DC", textcolor=color.white)

// === K æ£’ / RVS ç›¸é—œ =========================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === ğŸ›¡ï¸ æ’ä½é‚è¼¯ ============================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === å¤–éƒ¨ä¸‰è§’å½¢ ==============================================
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="å¤–éƒ¨å¤šé ­", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="å¤–éƒ¨ç©ºé ­", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVS / RVS-â˜… æ¨™è¨˜ ========================================
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS å¤šé ­", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS ç©ºé ­", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-â˜… å¤šé ­", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-â˜…", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-â˜… ç©ºé ­", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-â˜…", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="æ’ä½ ğŸ›¡ï¸", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="ğŸ›¡ï¸æ’ä½äº†", textcolor=color.white)

// === å›ºå®šå³ä¸Šè§’èªªæ˜ ==========================================
infoText =
     "ğŸŸ¢â–² å¤–éƒ¨å¤šé ­ï¼šæ•´æ ¹é«˜æ–¼ EMA10/20\n" +
     "ğŸŸ â–¼ å¤–éƒ¨ç©ºé ­ï¼šæ•´æ ¹ä½æ–¼ EMA10/20\n" +
     "ğŸŸª RVSï¼šåŒ…ä½ EMA10/20ï¼Œå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 2%\n" +
     "â­ RVS-â˜…ï¼šå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 4.5%\n" +
     "ğŸ›¡ï¸ æ’ä½ï¼šä½æ–¼ RVS-â˜… ä½†ç«™å›å‡ç·š\n" +
     "ğŸŸ© 6.26.9 GCï¼šMACD é‡‘å‰\n" +
     "ğŸŸ¥ 6.26.9 DCï¼šMACD æ­»å‰\n" +
     "ğŸ“ˆ åŠ ç¢¼ Long / ğŸ“‰ åŠ ç¢¼ Shortï¼šèˆ‡ç­–ç•¥é€²å ´åŒä½ç½®"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// ============================================================
// === âœ… å¤šå–®ï¼ç©ºå–®ã€ŒåŠ ç¢¼ã€æ¢ä»¶ï¼ˆèˆ‡ç­–ç•¥ Long/Short åŒæ­¥ï¼‰ =====
// ============================================================
// â€¼ï¸ ä½¿ç”¨ [1] â†’ å‰ä¸€æ ¹ K æ£’æ»¿è¶³æ¢ä»¶ â†’ åœ–ç¤ºç•«åœ¨æœ¬æ ¹ = ç­–ç•¥å¯¦éš›é€²å ´æ ¹
longAdd  = ta.crossover(macdLine[1], signalLine[1]) or (rvsGreen[1] and not strongRvsGreen[1])
shortAdd = ta.crossunder(macdLine[1], signalLine[1]) or (rvsRed[1]   and not strongRvsRed[1])

// --- ç•«åŠ ç¢¼æç¤º ----------------------------------------------
plotshape(longAdd,  title="ğŸ“ˆ åŠ ç¢¼ Long",  style=shape.arrowup  ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small,
          color=color.green, text="åŠ ç¢¼", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(shortAdd, title="ğŸ“‰ åŠ ç¢¼ Short", style=shape.arrowdown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small,
          color=color.red  , text="åŠ ç¢¼", textcolor=color.white)

// === å¿«è¨Šæ¢ä»¶ï¼šå‡ºå ´ï¼ˆä¿æŒåŸé‚è¼¯ï¼‰ ============================
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen

// === çµ„åˆå¿«è¨Šæ¢ä»¶ï¼ˆåŠ å…¥åŠ ç¢¼ï¼‰ ================================
longGroupAlert  = longAdd  or goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort
shortGroupAlert = shortAdd or deathCross  or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong

alertcondition(longGroupAlert , title="ğŸ“ˆ å¤šæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼ˆå«åŠ ç¢¼ï¼‰", message="å¤šæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿï¼šGC / RVS åšå¤š æˆ– å¤šå–®åŠ ç¢¼ / å¹³ç©º")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="ğŸ“‰ ç©ºæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼ˆå«åŠ ç¢¼ï¼‰", message="ç©ºæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿï¼šDC / RVS åšç©º æˆ– ç©ºå–®åŠ ç¢¼ / å¹³å¤š")

title: ğŸ“ˆ RVS + GC/DC 4H é€šç”¨ç‰ˆ v4.0
pine:
//@version=5
strategy("ğŸ“ˆ RVS + GC/DC 4H é€šç”¨ç‰ˆ v4.0", overlay=true,
     default_qty_type=strategy.percent_of_equity, default_qty_value=100)

// === é–‹é—œï¼šå•Ÿç”¨å›æ¸¬ç­–ç•¥ ===
enableBacktest = input.bool(true, "âœ… å•Ÿç”¨å›æ¸¬ç­–ç•¥ (é—œé–‰åªé¡¯ç¤ºæŒ‡æ¨™)")

// === EMA
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , title="EMA10", linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , title="EMA20", linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6â€‘26â€‘9
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast",   minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow",   minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === K æ£’å¯¦é«”è³‡è¨Š
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodySize = math.abs(close - open)
bodyPct  = bodySize / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

// === æ˜¯å¦åŒ…ä½ EMA10 / 20
ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

// === RVS & RVSâ€‘â˜…
rvsGreen        = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed          = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen  = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed    = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045
isStrongRVS     = strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed

// === ğŸ›¡ï¸ æ’ä½é‚è¼¯
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if isStrongRVS
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index
lookback = 5
barsSinceLastRvs = bar_index - lastRvsBar
isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and barsSinceLastRvs > 0 and barsSinceLastRvs <= lookback and isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === å¤–éƒ¨ä¸‰è§’å½¢
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20

// === é€²å‡ºå ´ç­–ç•¥ ===
if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size == 0
    if rvsGreen or goldenCross
        strategy.entry("Long", strategy.long)
    if rvsRed or deathCross
        strategy.entry("Short", strategy.short)

if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross)
    strategy.close("Long", comment="Exit å¤š")
if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross)
    strategy.close("Short", comment="Exit ç©º")

// === æ¨¡æ“¬ Exit æ¨™ç±¤
showExitLong  = strategy.position_size[1] > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross)
showExitShort = strategy.position_size[1] < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross)
exitYOffset = (high - low) * 1.5

if showExitLong
    label.new(bar_index, high + exitYOffset, "â›”å¹³å¤š", yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_down,
              color=color.red, textcolor=color.white, size=size.small)
if showExitShort
    label.new(bar_index, low - exitYOffset, "â›”å¹³ç©º", yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_up,
              color=color.lime, textcolor=color.black, size=size.small)

// === è¦–è¦ºæ¨™è¨˜
plotshape(goldenCross , title="GC", style=shape.triangleup   , location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime , size=size.small, text="GCåšå¤š",textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross  , title="DC", style=shape.triangledown , location=location.abovebar, color=color.red  , size=size.small, text="DCåšç©º",textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS å¤šé ­", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS åšå¤š", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed ,   title="RVS ç©ºé ­", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS åšç©º", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-â˜… å¤šé ­", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVSâ€‘â˜… åšå¤š", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed , title="RVS-â˜… ç©ºé ­", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVSâ€‘â˜… åšç©º", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(isHold, title="æ’ä½ ğŸ›¡ï¸", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="ğŸ›¡ï¸æ’ä½", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="å¤–éƒ¨å¤šé ­", style=shape.triangleup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="å¤–éƒ¨ç©ºé ­", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === å›ºå®šå³ä¸Šè§’èªªæ˜
infoText = "ğŸŸ¢â–² å¤–éƒ¨å¤šé ­ï¼šæ•´æ ¹é«˜æ–¼ EMA10/20\n" +
           "ğŸŸ â–¼ å¤–éƒ¨ç©ºé ­ï¼šæ•´æ ¹ä½æ–¼ EMA10/20\n" +
           "ğŸŸª RVSï¼šåŒ…ä½ EMA10/20ï¼Œå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 2%\n" +
           "â­ RVS-â˜…ï¼šå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 4.5%ï¼Œè¶…å¼·åè½‰\n" +
           "ğŸ›¡ï¸ æ’ä½ï¼šä½æ–¼ RVS-â˜… ä½†ç«™å›å‡ç·š\n" +
           "ğŸŸ© 6.26.9 GCï¼šMACD é‡‘å‰ï¼ŒçŸ­ç·šè½‰å¼·\n" +
           "ğŸŸ¥ 6.26.9 DCï¼šMACD æ­»å‰ï¼ŒçŸ­ç·šè½‰å¼±\n" +
           "âš™ï¸ å›æ¸¬é–‹é—œï¼š" + (enableBacktest ? "ON" : "OFF")

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText, xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small, color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY)
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === å¿«è¨Šæ¢ä»¶ ==========================
alertcondition(goldenCross , title = "â‡ï¸ GC åšå¤š", message = "GC åšå¤šè¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼")
alertcondition(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title = "ğŸ’œ RVS åšå¤š", message = "RVS åšå¤šè¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼")
alertcondition(showExitLong , title = "â›” å¹³å¤š", message = "å¹³å¤šå‡ºå ´è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼")

alertcondition(deathCross , title = "ğŸ”» DC åšç©º", message = "DC åšç©ºè¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼")
alertcondition(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed , title = "ğŸ’œ RVS åšç©º", message = "RVS åšç©ºè¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼")
alertcondition(showExitShort, title = "â›” å¹³ç©º", message = "å¹³ç©ºå‡ºå ´è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼")

title: RDç¾è²¨-ç„¡ç­–ç•¥+é¬§é˜ç‰ˆæœ¬
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("ğŸ“Œ RDç¾è²¨-ç„¡ç­–ç•¥+é¬§é˜ç‰ˆæœ¬", overlay=true)

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue, linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Length"  , minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Length"  , minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Length", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === ç•« GC / DC æ¨™è¨˜ =========================================
plotshape(goldenCross, title="MACD é‡‘å‰", style=shape.triangleup,
          location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime, size=size.small,
          text="GC", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(deathCross , title="MACD æ­»å‰", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, color=color.red, size=size.small,
          text="DC", textcolor=color.white)

// === K æ£’ / RVS ç›¸é—œ =========================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === ğŸ›¡ï¸ æ’ä½é‚è¼¯ ============================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === å¤–éƒ¨ä¸‰è§’å½¢ ==============================================
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="å¤–éƒ¨å¤šé ­", style=shape.triangleup,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="å¤–éƒ¨ç©ºé ­", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVS / RVS-â˜… æ¨™è¨˜ ========================================
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS å¤šé ­", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS ç©ºé ­", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-â˜… å¤šé ­", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-â˜…", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-â˜… ç©ºé ­", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-â˜…", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="æ’ä½ ğŸ›¡ï¸", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="ğŸ›¡ï¸æ’ä½äº†", textcolor=color.white)

// === å›ºå®šå³ä¸Šè§’èªªæ˜ ==========================================
infoText =
     "ğŸŸ¢â–² å¤–éƒ¨å¤šé ­ï¼šæ•´æ ¹é«˜æ–¼ EMA10/20\n" +
     "ğŸŸ â–¼ å¤–éƒ¨ç©ºé ­ï¼šæ•´æ ¹ä½æ–¼ EMA10/20\n" +
     "ğŸŸª RVSï¼šåŒ…ä½ EMA10/20ï¼Œå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 2%\n" +
     "â­ RVS-â˜…ï¼šå¯¦é«” â‰¥ 4.5%\n" +
     "ğŸ›¡ï¸ æ’ä½ï¼šä½æ–¼ RVS-â˜… ä½†ç«™å›å‡ç·š\n" +
     "ğŸŸ© 6.26.9 GCï¼šMACD é‡‘å‰\n" +
     "ğŸŸ¥ 6.26.9 DCï¼šMACD æ­»å‰"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_left,size=size.small, color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === å¿«è¨Šæ¢ä»¶ï¼šå‡ºå ´
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed     // å¤šå–®è©²å‡ºå ´ï¼ˆå‡ºç¾ç©ºè¨Šï¼‰
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen  // ç©ºå–®è©²å‡ºå ´ï¼ˆå‡ºç¾å¤šè¨Šï¼‰

// === çµ„åˆå¿«è¨Šæ¢ä»¶
longGroupAlert  = goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort
shortGroupAlert = deathCross or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong

alertcondition(longGroupAlert, title="ğŸ“ˆ å¤šæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼šGCã€RVS åšå¤šæˆ– å¹³ç©º", message="å¤šæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼šGCã€RVS åšå¤šæˆ– å¹³ç©º")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="ğŸ“‰ å¤šæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼šGCã€RVS åšå¤šæˆ– å¹³ç©º", message="ç©ºæ–¹è¨Šè™Ÿè§¸ç™¼ï¼šDCã€RVS åšç©ºæˆ– å¹³å¤š")

title: MACD 6.26.9 ç´…ç¶ é»è¨­è¨ˆ
summary: æ”¹è‰¯ç‰ˆçš„ MACD æŒ‡æ¨™ï¼ˆç§»å‹•å¹³å‡æ”¶æ–‚èƒŒé›¢æŒ‡æ¨™ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸åªç•«å‡ºå‚³çµ±çš„ MACD ç·šèˆ‡ Signal ç·šï¼Œé‚„ é¡å¤–åœ¨é‡‘å‰èˆ‡æ­»å‰çš„ä½ç½®æ¨™è¨˜ç¶ è‰²èˆ‡ç´…è‰²åœ“é»ï¼Œå”åŠ©ç”¨æˆ¶è¦–è¦ºä¸Šå¿«é€Ÿè¾¨è­˜å¤šç©ºè¨Šè™Ÿã€‚
pine:
//@version=6
indicator(title="MACD 6.26.9 ç´…ç¶ é»è¨­è¨ˆ", shorttitle="MACD", overlay=false)

// === åƒæ•¸ ===
fast_length   = input.int(title="Fast Length",   defval=12, minval=1, maxval=50)
slow_length   = input.int(title="Slow Length",   defval=26, minval=1, maxval=100)
signal_length = input.int(title="Signal Smoothing", defval=9,  minval=1, maxval=50)

sma_source = input.string(title="MACD MA Type",  defval="EMA", options=["SMA", "EMA"])
sma_signal = input.string(title="Signal MA Type", defval="EMA", options=["SMA", "EMA"])

src = input.source(title="Source", defval=close)

// === æ¨£å¼ ===
macdColor    = input.color(title="MACD ç·šé¡è‰²",   defval=color.blue)
signalColor  = input.color(title="Signal ç·šé¡è‰²", defval=color.orange)
macdWidth    = input.int(title="MACD ç·šå¯¬",       defval=1, minval=1, maxval=5)
signalWidth  = input.int(title="Signal ç·šå¯¬",     defval=1, minval=1, maxval=5)

// === è¨ˆç®— ===
fast_ma = sma_source == "SMA" ? ta.sma(src, fast_length) : ta.ema(src, fast_length)
slow_ma = sma_source == "SMA" ? ta.sma(src, slow_length) : ta.ema(src, slow_length)
macd    = fast_ma - slow_ma
signal  = sma_signal == "SMA" ? ta.sma(macd, signal_length) : ta.ema(macd, signal_length)

// === åœ–å½¢ ===
hline(0, "Zero Line", color=color.new(color.gray, 60))
plot(macd,   title="MACD Line",   color=macdColor,   linewidth=macdWidth)
plot(signal, title="Signal Line", color=signalColor, linewidth=signalWidth)

// === é‡‘å‰ / æ­»å‰ æ¨™è¨˜ ===
goldenCross = ta.crossover(macd, signal)   // å¿«ç·šä¸Šç©¿ â†’ é‡‘å‰
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macd, signal)  // å¿«ç·šä¸‹ç©¿ â†’ æ­»å‰

plot(goldenCross ? macd : na, title="Golden Cross Point", style=plot.style_circles, color=color.lime, linewidth=3)
plot(deathCross  ? macd : na, title="Death Cross Point",  style=plot.style_circles, color=color.red,  linewidth=3)
